about_the_game:
Tyler Warren is back again with this 4th set of 50 battlers, this time re-imagining the default RPG Maker VX Ace batters. This pack features 50 battlers, including 33 RTP-matching monsters and 17 Tyler Warren original characters. Tyler’s delightful and unique style has been applied to the default Run-Time Package (RTP), matching all 32 monsters from the Monster 1-3, and Big Monster 1-2 sprite sheets. Bring new life to classic RTP characters and combine with Tyler’s other packs for an ever expansive library in the same fun style, likened to Dragon Quest or a children’s book illustration.

Features:

* 50 unique battlers (33 from the VX Ace RTP and 17 all new)
* Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
* All 50 battlers are presented in a range of sizes from large to mini; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues!
* Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for both MV and VX Ace
* Style used matches Tyler Warren’s other battler packs, similar in spirit to classic RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
* Use these with Tyler’s other 150 battlers for 200+ exciting characters for your next JRPG!
* Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability in multiple RPG Maker programs

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RTP Redesign 1" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RTP Redesign 1" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RTP Redesign 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Tyler Warren returns with his creative spin on the VX Ace RTP battlers!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
